ComicInfo.Summary:
Just in time for Halloween, music superstar Rob Zombie pens four tales of horror, comedy and suspense! First, witness the wrath of the Evil Zombie - drawn by the legendary Gene Colan! Next, you've seen House of 1,000 Corpses, now read two stories that made the movie a cult hit! Finally, Kieron Dwyer (Avengers) pencils a tale of monsters, espionageâ€¦and strip clubs! Who is Super Spy El Superbeasto? Plus: a petrifying painted pin-up by Dan Brereton!
*Contents* The Return Of Screaming Lord Zombie The Fall And Rise Of Doctor Satan The Haunted World Of El Superbeasto Episode #1 Monkey See Monkey Kill! Captain Spaulding Presents Hit Squad For God Behind The Scenes With House Of 1000 Corpses
ComicInfo.Title: Hit Squad for God; Monkey See, Monkey Kill!; The Fall and Rise of Dr. Satan; The Return of Screaming Lord Zombie; Spookshow International
